attributes.description: TAKE A DRIVE ON THE WILD SIDE!!!! - SUZUKI 2020 BALENO 1.4 GLX 5DR A/T is finally here and this is what makes it so popular. In front the grille and bumper have been revised giving the vehicle a more assertive look. Besides the new alloy wheel design and some added chrome trim on the exterior, the visual differences is so prominent.  Front and rear leg- and headroom are both class-leading and the cabin is wide enough to seat an average family. With LED headlights, keyless entry with pushbutton start, electric windows all round, automatic climate control, cruise control, rear parking sensors, a rear-view camera, leather trim for the steering wheel, and a 7-inch colour touchscreen infotainment system with USB/Bluetooth compatibility and smartphone mirroring. With a full Dekra condition report and roadworthy as well. Please note that price does not include dealership fees and smash and grab.
